name: Air Force Kong Vs the Sky Plane Battle Squadrons
name_original: Air Force Kong Vs the Sky Plane Battle Squadrons
description:
Leap aboard your plane and head out across the arctic sky to meet the dogfight head on in this epic shoot em up air-race game.

Calling Air Force Kong! Those darn Enemy apes have taken over the skies again and are heading your way, destroy them and stop them reaching ground zero. With no time to lose, learn to master your pilot skills and soar to new heights as you unlock better planes along the way.

Collect coins to upgrade your aircraft and swoop down on power ups to help you complete your mission. Can you beat your friends on the leaderboards to become the ultimate Turbo Kong who saves the world?

Don those goggles and flappy scarf, its time to let loose the throttle and fly Kong fly!

Features:
- Game Center Leaderboards
- 4 Air Force Kong Planes
- One Touch Game Play
- Great Power Ups
- Fast Shoot em up Adventure
